name: SOK MIN
description:
SOK MIN is a sokoban classic puzzle game, the sequel of the SOK puzzle. This game contains only the smallest and the easiest levels in the history of SOK puzzles. The goal of the game is to move all the boxes to their positions. Now it's easier than ever. You do not need a guide for completing each level. Just push the boxes!

  • Fascinating gameplay
  • Lots of the easiest levels
